CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1962, pg. 1 reads: "All-Night Gospel Sing For Drafts Fund-Thoughtful - "We want to help as many persons as possible, and especially this boy," were the words of Miss Martha Sapps (left) and her sister-in-law, Mrs. Barbara Sapps, when they turned in $20 which they had collected in neighborhood, prior to the gospel sing."
TitMainTitle: Martha Sapps and sister-in-law Barbara Sapps, standing behind microphone with Bill Powell in Calvary Baptist Church for All Night Gospel Sing for the Charles "Buggsy" Drafts Fund
